Hero.title: Transform Your Space into a Work of Art
Hero.subtitle: Award-winning interior design, fitout solutions, and construction management
Hero.description: We are the definitive Design and Build partner for the UAE's elite. Whether you are developing a 5-star hotel or building your private family estate, we deliver absolute perfection.

Services.heading: Our Services
Services.title: What We Offer
Services.description: From concept to completion, we deliver excellence in Interior Design, Fitout Solutions, and Construction Management.

interiorDesign.title: Interior Design
interiorDesign.description: Complete interior design solutions that blend aesthetics with functionality. We create bespoke spaces that reflect your personality and lifestyle, from concept development to final styling.

fitoutSolutions.title: Fitout Solutions
fitoutSolutions.description: Professional fitout services for residential and commercial spaces. Our team handles everything from space planning to installation, ensuring quality and efficiency at every step.

constructionManagement.title: Construction Management
constructionManagement.description: End-to-end construction management services that ensure your project is delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship.

interiorArchitecture.title: Interior Architecture
interiorArchitecture.description: Interior architectural design that integrates structure, space, and light to create exceptional environments that exceed expectations.

mepEngineering.title: MEP Engineering
mepEngineering.description: Integrated engineering solutions for mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems, focusing on efficiency and sustainability.

civilConstruction.title: Civil Construction
civilConstruction.description: Comprehensive construction services from foundations to finishes, with strict adherence to safety and quality standards.

manufacturingJoinery.title: Manufacturing & Joinery
manufacturingJoinery.description: Custom furniture and joinery manufacturing with the highest standards of craftsmanship, from design to installation.

handoverMaintenance.title: Handover & Maintenance
handoverMaintenance.description: Comprehensive handover services and annual maintenance contracts to ensure the continued quality of your project.

Capabilities.heading: Our Capabilities
Capabilities.description: From concept to completion, every phase flows through our integrated system.

build.title: The Main Contractor
build.description: We hold the trade license to execute heavy civil works. From excavation and piling to the concrete superstructure, our own teams are on site daily.

design.title: The Design Studio
design.description: Our creative team designs the vision, but because they work alongside the builders, every drawing is validated for cost and feasibility before you see it.

power.title: In-House MEP Division
power.description: We don't sub-contract the most critical systems. Our in-house engineers design and install the HVAC, electrical, and plumbing grids that keep your asset alive.

make.title: The Mouhajer Factory
make.description: Why wait for imports? We manufacture your fire-rated doors, wardrobes, and custom furniture in our own local facility, ensuring perfect fit and zero shipping delays.

install.title: The Craftsmen
install.description: Our own marble masons, gypsum artists, and painters execute the finish. This allows us to achieve a level of detail that subcontracted labor simply cannot match.

care.title: The Keys
care.description: We don't just hand over keys; we activate your asset. From white-glove deep cleaning to system programming and annual maintenance contracts, we protect your investment long after the build is done.

Sectors.label: Sectors of Expertise
Sectors.description: Delivering turnkey excellence across the UAE's most dynamic industries.

hospitality.title: Luxury Hospitality
hospitality.subtitle: The Partner of Choice for 5-Star Brands
hospitality.description: We understand the delicate balance of hospitality renovation, upgrading operating assets without disrupting the guest experience. From grand lobbies to royal suites, we deliver high-spec interiors.

residential.title: High-End Residential
residential.subtitle: Creating Private Sanctuaries
residential.description: For over 25 years, MIDC has been the secret behind Dubai's most exclusive private addresses. We handle the complete lifecycle of luxury villas and penthouses.

commercial.title: Commercial & Corporate
commercial.subtitle: Defining Business Environments
commercial.description: We build spaces that empower business. Our design-build approach ensures functional, branded environments delivered on tight timelines.

Process.heading: Our Process
Process.title: How We Work
Process.description: Our proven six-step process ensures every project is executed with precision, creativity, and unwavering attention to detail
Process.cta: Ready to start your design journey?

discovery.title: Discovery & Consultation
discovery.description: We begin by understanding your vision, lifestyle, and requirements through in-depth consultations and site analysis.

concept.title: Concept Development
concept.description: Our team creates initial design concepts, mood boards, and 3D visualizations to bring your vision to life.

refinement.title: Design Refinement
refinement.description: We refine the designs based on your feedback, selecting materials, finishes, and furniture that align with your aesthetic.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: Our expert team manages the entire execution process, coordinating with contractors and ensuring quality at every step.

styling.title: Styling & Finishing
styling.description: We add the final touches with carefully curated accessories, art, and styling to perfect every detail.

completion.title: Project Completion
completion.description: Final walkthrough and handover of your transformed space, along with comprehensive documentation and care guides.

Projects.heading: Our Projects
Projects.title: Featured Work
Projects.description: Explore our portfolio of exceptional interior design and fitout projects across the UAE

Industries.heading: Our Industries
Industries.title: Industries We Serve
Industries.description: We provide specialized design and fitout solutions for various industries, with deep understanding of each sector's requirements

luxuryResidential.title: Luxury Residential
luxuryResidential.subtitle: Villas, Palaces & Penthouses
luxuryResidential.description: We design luxury homes that reflect their owners' lifestyle, with attention to the finest details and the use of premium materials.

hospitality.title: Luxury Hospitality
hospitality.subtitle: Hotels, Restaurants & Resorts
hospitality.description: We create unforgettable hospitality experiences that combine luxury, comfort, and distinctive brand identity.

commercial.title: Commercial & Corporate
commercial.subtitle: Offices & Corporate Headquarters
commercial.description: We design inspiring work environments that enhance productivity and reflect the company's identity and values.

retail.title: Retail & Stores
retail.subtitle: Shops & Commercial Showrooms
retail.description: We design attractive retail spaces that enhance the shopping experience and increase sales.

healthcare.title: Healthcare
healthcare.subtitle: Clinics, Hospitals & Health Centers
healthcare.description: We design healthcare facilities that combine functionality, comfort, and compliance with medical standards.

About.heading: About Us
About.title: Our Story
About.subtitle: Mouhajer International Design
About.description: Since 2009, we've been transforming visions into reality through excellence in design and execution. We are a fully integrated design and fitout company providing comprehensive solutions from concept to delivery.
About.story: Mouhajer International Design was founded with a clear vision: to provide an integrated design and execution experience with international standards. Over more than 15 years, we have executed hundreds of successful projects in the UAE and the region.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To deliver exceptional design experiences that exceed our clients' expectations, with commitment to the highest standards of quality and innovation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the first choice for luxury interior design and fitout in the region, known for excellence and creativity.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every detail

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace the latest technologies and ideas

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We commit to transparency and honesty

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work as one team with our clients

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A team of professional designers, engineers, and craftsmen

founder.title: The Founder
founder.name: Ahmad Mouhajer
founder.bio: A visionary in the world of interior design with over 20 years of experience in transforming spaces into works of art.

awards.title: Our Awards
awards.description: Recognition for our excellence in design and execution
